_header: To kiss the steps of them that were furthering

BodArcSelB10.First Lines:
To kys the steppes of them that were fortheryngeLaureate poetes
                    whiche had soueraynte…
BodArcSelB10.Last Lines:
…Lowly to obeye to youre magnyfycensOr dysobeye by
                    inobedyence
BodArcSelB10.Attributed Title:
All short poems in the manuscript are collected in one section entitled
                    ‘The prouerbes of lydgate’. At the end of the section: ‘Here
                    endethe the prouerbes of Lydgate vpon the fall of prynces. Enpryntede at london
                    in flete stret at the sygne of the sonne by Wynkyn Worde’.
